Uses of Package
de.gnwi.jdpd.accumulators

  • Packages that use de.gnwi.jdpd.accumulators 
    Package Description
    de.gnwi.jdpd.interfaces  
    de.gnwi.jdpd.samples.integrationType  
    de.gnwi.jdpd.utilities  
  • Classes in de.gnwi.jdpd.accumulators used by de.gnwi.jdpd.interfaces 
    Class and Description
    ParticleForceMagnitudeAccumulator
    Accumulator for particle force magnitude analysis.
    PotentialAccumulator
    Potential accumulator that uses ExtendedAdderGroup instance for accumulative ("+=") operations.
  • Classes in de.gnwi.jdpd.accumulators used by de.gnwi.jdpd.samples.integrationType 
    Class and Description
    ParticleForceMagnitudeAccumulator
    Accumulator for particle force magnitude analysis.
    PotentialAccumulator
    Potential accumulator that uses ExtendedAdderGroup instance for accumulative ("+=") operations.
  • Classes in de.gnwi.jdpd.accumulators used by de.gnwi.jdpd.utilities 
    Class and Description
    ForceAccumulator
    Force accumulator that uses (and changes) the particle related arrays ParticleArrays.getF_x/getFtwo_x, ParticleArrays.getF_y/getFtwo_y and ParticleArrays.getF_z/getFtwo_z for accumulative ("+=" and "-=") operations.
    PotentialAccumulator
    Potential accumulator that uses ExtendedAdderGroup instance for accumulative ("+=") operations.
